alert.note: Alert for Bolivar; Sunflower; Washington (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 12 at 1:51AM CDT until March 12 at 2:30AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 130 AM CST FOR SUNFLOWER...NORTHERN WASHINGTON AND SOUTHEASTERN BOLIVAR COUNTIES... At 1251 AM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles southwest of Dublin to near Boyle to near Holly Ridge, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. These severe storms will be near... Ruleville around 100 AM CST. Indianola, Parchman, Sunflower, Blaine and Rome around 105 AM CST. Moorhead around 120 AM CST. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Winstonville, Doddsville and Merigold. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
